BMW M4 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on BMW M4 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of BMW M4 changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on BMW M4 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

Have you heard about M4? If you are a fan of BMW, you might be aware that this new version is coming with many improved features. You will love both the style and performance. Surely, we can expect some similar characteristics common for BMW vehicles. Besides, there will be a few additions to make it distinct from the previous ones.

This new version is a compact and dependable rear-drive vehicle with brilliant performance and a different look. If you believe the rumors, it is better than M2 but lower than M6.

 

Engine specs

The 2018 M4 engine is improved. It is powered by a 3.0-liter twin-turbo I-6 rated at 425 horsepower. Besides, it has 406 lb-ft of torque. It will be paired with the seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission or a six-speed manual. For the competition, there will be total output to 444 horsepower.

The most powerful among all the versions is the M4 CS. This version is appreciated for the increased horsepower. There will be 454 horsepower and 442 lb-ft torque under the hood. The expected BMW M4 0-60 times is 3.7 seconds.

When it comes to the EPA fuel economy ratings, the M4 vehicles are 17/24 mpg with the automatic and 17/25 mpg city/highway with the manual. But the M4 convertible will have a few differences. It is rated at 16/22 mpg with the automatic and 17/25 mpg with the manual.

 

Interior and Exterior

There will not be many differences. You might not need much detail. But yes, while discussing the global market and the hype for this new version, you will have to find the buyers for this new version. If you go through the previous records, the USA will come as the number one market for M4. Besides, it will be one of the top markets for your 4-series.

You should not expect much difference in the exterior and interior design. If you love other versions, you will love this one as well. But yes, you might like a few additions. It will have new headlights like its siblings. You will find a more pointed take on BMW’s common twin circular running lights and LED lights. These are well-known and familiar features of BMW.

In addition, there will be new lights that you will find at the rear. There will be some subtle changes in the LED elements to offer a fresh and distinct look. If you are driving the older M4, you might find this change new and innovative. There will be some other changes as well. There is double stitching for the dashboard top and new chrome interior trim. Moreover, M4 will not be ordered with your digital instrument package. Now, this option is limited to standard 4-series.

 

Verdict

From the above details, you might have realized that M4’s engine gives it preference over RCF. The reason is that it has torque-rich power band. It will be lightweight and will come with minimal body roll that will make the driving easy and fast. You will get the best performance for sure. But at the same time, you need to be comfortable with the limits.
